Description:
Detects an executable, which is not an internet browser or known application, initiating network connections to legit popular websites, which were seen to be used as dead drop resolvers in previous attacks.
In this context attackers leverage known websites such as "facebook", "youtube", etc. In order to pass through undetected.


Author: Sorina Ionescu, X__Junior (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: New Connection Initiated To Potential Dead Drop Resolver Domain
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where ((initiated = 'true' and (dst_host like '%.t.me' or dst_host like '%4shared.com' or dst_host like '%abuse.ch' or dst_host like '%anonfiles.com' or dst_host like '%cdn.discordapp.com' or dst_host like '%cloudflare.com' or dst_host like '%ddns.net' or dst_host like '%discord.com' or dst_host like '%docs.google.com' or dst_host like '%drive.google.com' or dst_host like '%dropbox.com' or dst_host like '%dropmefiles.com' or dst_host like '%facebook.com' or dst_host like '%feeds.rapidfeeds.com' or dst_host like '%fotolog.com' or dst_host like '%ghostbin.co/' or dst_host like '%githubusercontent.com' or dst_host like '%gofile.io' or dst_host like '%hastebin.com' or dst_host like '%imgur.com' or dst_host like '%livejournal.com' or dst_host like '%mediafire.com' or dst_host like '%mega.co.nz' or dst_host like '%mega.nz' or dst_host like '%onedrive.com' or dst_host like '%pages.dev' or dst_host like '%paste.ee' or dst_host like '%pastebin.com' or dst_host like '%pastebin.pl' or dst_host like '%pastetext.net' or dst_host like '%pixeldrain.com' or dst_host like '%privatlab.com' or dst_host like '%privatlab.net' or dst_host like '%reddit.com' or dst_host like '%send.exploit.in' or dst_host like '%sendspace.com' or dst_host like '%steamcommunity.com' or dst_host like '%storage.googleapis.com' or dst_host like '%technet.microsoft.com' or dst_host like '%temp.sh' or dst_host like '%transfer.sh' or dst_host like '%trycloudflare.com' or dst_host like '%twitter.com' or dst_host like '%ufile.io' or dst_host like '%vimeo.com' or dst_host like '%w3spaces.com' or dst_host like '%wetransfer.com' or dst_host like '%workers.dev' or dst_host like '%youtube.com')) and  not ((process_path like '%\AppData\Local\Discord\%' and process_path like '%\Discord.exe' and (dst_host like '%discord.com' or dst_host like '%cdn.discordapp.com')) or (process_path = 'C:\Program Files\Google\Chrome\Application\chrome.exe' or process_path = 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Google\Chrome\Application\chrome.exe') or (process_path like 'C:\Users\%' and process_path like '%\AppData\Local\Google\Chrome\Application\chrome.exe') or ((process_path like 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft\EdgeCore\%' or process_path like 'C:\Program Files\Microsoft\EdgeCore\%') and (process_path like '%\msedge.exe' or process_path like '%\msedgewebview2.exe')) or ((process_path like 'C:\Program Files\SeaMonkey\%' or process_path like 'C:\Program Files (x86)\SeaMonkey\%') and process_path like '%\seamonkey.exe') or (process_path = 'C:\Program Files\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe' or process_path = 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe') or (process_path like '%\AppData\Local\Programs\midori-ng\%' and process_path like '%\Midori Next Generation.exe') or ((process_path like 'C:\Program Files (x86)\WindowsApps\%' or process_path like 'C:\Program Files\WindowsApps\%') and process_path like '%\WhatsApp.exe' and dst_host like '%facebook.com') or process_path = '' or (process_path like 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft\EdgeWebView\Application\%' and process_path like '%\WindowsApps\MicrosoftEdge.exe' and (process_path = 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft\Edge\Application\msedge.exe' or process_path = 'C:\Program Files\Microsoft\Edge\Application\msedge.exe')) or (process_path like 'C:\Program Files\BraveSoftware\%' and process_path like '%\brave.exe') or (process_path like '%\AppData\Local\Programs\Opera\%' and process_path like '%\opera.exe') or ((process_path like 'C:\Program Files\Naver\Naver Whale\%' or process_path like 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Naver\Naver Whale\%') and process_path like '%\whale.exe') or ((process_path like '%\MEGAsync.exe' or process_path like '%\MEGAsyncSetup32_*RC.exe' or process_path like '%\MEGAsyncSetup32.exe' or process_path like '%\MEGAsyncSetup64.exe' or process_path like '%\MEGAupdater.exe') and (dst_host like '%mega.co.nz' or dst_host like '%mega.nz')) or (process_path like 'C:\Users\%' and process_path like '%\AppData\Local\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe') or ((process_path like '%C:\Program Files (x86)\Safari\%' or process_path like '%C:\Program Files\Safari\%') and process_path like '%\safari.exe') or ((process_path like '%C:\Program Files\Windows Defender Advanced Threat Protection\%' or process_path like '%C:\Program Files\Windows Defender\%' or process_path like '%C:\ProgramData\Microsoft\Windows Defender\Platform\%') and (process_path like '%\MsMpEng.exe' or process_path like '%\MsSense.exe')) or ((process_path like 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Dropbox\Client\%' or process_path like 'C:\Program Files\Dropbox\Client\%') and (process_path like '%\Dropbox.exe' or process_path like '%\DropboxInstaller.exe') and dst_host like '%dropbox.com') or (process_path like '%\AppData\Local\Vivaldi\%' and process_path like '%\vivaldi.exe') or ((process_path like 'C:\Program Files\Waterfox\%' or process_path like 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Waterfox\%') and process_path like '%\Waterfox.exe') or ((process_path like '%C:\Program Files\Google\Drive File Stream\%' or process_path like '%C:\Program Files (x86)\Google\Drive File Stream\%') and process_path like '%GoogleDriveFS.exe' and dst_host like '%drive.google.com') or (process_path like '%\AppData\Local\Flock\%' and process_path like '%\Flock.exe') or ((process_path like 'C:\Program Files (x86)\QtWeb\%' or process_path like 'C:\Program Files\QtWeb\%') and process_path like '%\QtWeb.exe') or (process_path like '%\AppData\Local\Microsoft\OneDrive\%' and process_path like '%\OneDrive.exe' and dst_host like '%onedrive.com') or process_path = 'null' or ((process_path like 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Avant Browser\%' or process_path like 'C:\Program Files\Avant Browser\%') and process_path like '%\avant.exe') or (process_path like '%\AppData\Roaming\Telegram Desktop\%' and process_path like '%\Telegram.exe' and dst_host like '%.t.me') or (process_path like '%C:\Program Files (x86)\PRTG Network Monitor\PRTG Probe.exe' or process_path like '%C:\Program Files\PRTG Network Monitor\PRTG Probe.exe') or (process_path like '%\AppData\Local\Maxthon\%' and process_path like '%\maxthon.exe') or ((process_path like 'C:\Program Files\SlimBrowser\%' or process_path like 'C:\Program Files (x86)\SlimBrowser\%') and process_path like '%\slimbrowser.exe') or (process_path = 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe' or process_path = 'C:\Program Files\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe') or (process_path like '%\AppData\Local\Phoebe\%' and process_path like '%\Phoebe.exe') or ((process_path like 'C:\Program Files\Falkon\%' or process_path like 'C:\Program Files (x86)\Falkon\%') and process_path like '%\falkon.exe')))
